short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invert the colors of any webpage for a darker browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any webpage into dark mode with just a click! 'Page Color Inverter' is an intuitive Chrome extension designed to protect your eyes and enhance your browsing experience in low-light environments. Whether you're working late or prefer a darker theme, our extension provides an instant, user-friendly solution.

Features:

Instant Inversion: One-click to invert colors on any site, reducing glare and making it easier to read in dark settings.
Toggle On/Off: Easily revert back to the original page style with a simple click.
Universal Compatibility: Works seamlessly on all websites, providing a consistent dark mode experience across the web.
Lightweight and Fast: Designed to be unobtrusive, our extension doesn't slow down your browsing.
Perfect for night-time browsers, those with light sensitivity, or anyone who prefers a darker theme for their web experience. Try 'Page Color Inverter' now and give your eyes the comfort they deserve!
